message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $90. This is a one-time offer, so don't miss out!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $90 is a bit too high for me.  Would you consider $70?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer of $70. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $82. This is a fair price considering the value it brings. Let me know if this works for you!
Hi Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit.  How about $75, would that work for you?
Hi Bob, I'm still a bit hesitant to go all the way to $75. How about we meet in the middle at $79? This is a fair price that I'm comfortable with. Let me know if this works for you!
